message: Let's start with a fair offer, Bob. 60/40 seems reasonable.
I appreciate the fair start, Alice. But I believe a 60/40 split, in my favor this time, is more equitable. Let's see if you agree.
I understand you want a larger share, Bob, but your offer wasn't fair to me. I'm willing to compromise with a 55/45 split in my favor.  Time is running out, and we both lose if we don't agree soon.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise. Let's split the difference and go with a 55/45 split in my favor.  We're both losing money with each passing round, so let's find common ground.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. We both need to agree soon or we both get nothing. I'm showing you I'm willing to negotiate by dropping my ask again.  Let's settle on 52/48 and be done with this.

Alice,  I understand your frustration, but we can't both be getting more with each round.  Let's meet in the middle again and go with a 52/48 split in my favor. This is our best chance to get something before the money is completely worthless.
Bob, this is ridiculous. I'm making another concession, but this is my final offer. 51/49 or we both walk away with nothing. Don't be greedy, Bob!
